item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 16, 2025 at 3:05 AM UTC
item.description:
1. CVE program faces swift end after DHS fails to renew contract (55 points | 45 comments)

3. Markov Chain Monte Carlo Without All the Bullshit (2015) (18 points | 1 comment)

10. Flexport (YC W14) is hiring software engineers ( | hide)

23. Adding Structured Data to a Rails Application (3 points | discuss)
24. Chroma: Ubisoft's internal tool used to simulate color-blindness (190 points | 59 comments)
25. Zig's new LinkedList API (it's time to learn fieldParentPtr) (179 points | 149 comments)
26. Liquid: Language models are scalable and unified multi-modal generators (57 points | 6 comments)
27. An interactive introduction to rotors from geometric algebra (2018) (15 points | 1 comment)
28. What does it mean for a technology to follow Wright's Law? (20 points | 1 comment)
29. Whistleblower details how DOGE may have taken sensitive NLRB data (771 points | 382 comments)
30. Fake images that fooled the world (88 points | 44 comments)
